QuestData.Title: First Time? You Have to Fight!
QuestData.Description:
When it comes to warfare, strength of will is as critical as strength of arms. A demoralized soldier is a defeated soldier!
We have the numbers to overwhelm the constructs with a full scale assault, but only if our forces are fully committed to the charge. Some may fall, but their sacrifice will secure our victory!
Take this battle horn and rally our troops. Remind them of their duty to the Chosen!
QuestData.RewardText: Our forces stand ready to fight once more!
